page.title: 07CRIME IN OUR AREA.
page.content: In todays police-force you have to do at least a two year beat before you get any ranking.The lowest rank is Constable and the highest rank is Chief-Superintendant. The C.I.D (criminal investigation department) usually deal with assault,drugs,theft,auto-theft and burglary.In our area it is the more expensive property that is burgled most often.Schools and shops are also burgled,local schools are usally broken into by their own pupils and a lot of damage is caused.Videos electronic equipment is stolen. Pedal bikes are often stolen and are very rarely recovered because they are taken apart and the bits are sold seperately.The police are now stamping bikes with their owners post code in an attempt to cut down on this type of theft.
